explanation: Funds are required to be transferred to the Procurement, Defense-Wide; 24/26, appropriation from the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, 24/25, appropriation for the proper execution of a FY 2024 congressional increase. for blast exposure monitoring. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were originally. appropriated. This is a congressional special interest item.

Funds are available to be transferred from the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, 24/24, appropriation to the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-wide, 24/25 appropriation for the proper execution of a FY 2024 congressional increase for female body armor.
